content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. While discussing the rental price for this modern apartment in Magdeburg's city center, let me emphasize its exceptional value due to its prime location and high-quality finishing. However, as a strategic landlord, I must secure the optimal price for my investment, so I'm open to hearing your proposed offer. Once you share your figure, I'll consider it carefully and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the apartment details and your perspective as a landlord. Considering my financial situation and desiring to rent this well-positioned apartment, I propose a monthly rental price of 650 Euros. I believe this offer is fair and competitive while still accommodating your investment objectives. Now, I await your response.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for presenting your offer, Emilia. While I acknowledge your financial considerations and enthusiasm for this apartment, I must emphasize the exceptional demand for such a desirable property in the city center. After thorough deliberation, I'm afraid I must decline your proposed rental price of 650 Euros. As a landlord committed to maximizing returns, I would require a minimum monthly rent of 700 Euros to proceed with the lease agreement. I hope you understand and consider my decision. If you have any alternative offers or questions, please feel free to continue the discussion. Otherwise, let's conclude this negotiation with 'TERMINATE' if no further agreement can be reached.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
